package.name: serendipity_plugin_communityrating
package.description: Shows top-rated movies by their average rating

maintainer.name: Lewe Zipfel, Garvin Hicking. Ian Styx

package.name: serendipity_plugin_faq
package.description: Choose the categories you will display on the blog.

package.name: serendipity_plugin_freetag
package.description: Shows a list of existing tags for entries

maintainer.name: Garvin Hicking, Jonathan Arkell, Grischa Brockhaus, Lars Strojny, Ian Styx

package.name: serendipity_plugin_geotag
package.description: This plugin displays a Google Map or Openstreetmap with geotagged entries

maintainer.name: Matthew Groeninger, Omid Mottaghi Rad, Ian Styx

package.name: serendipity_plugin_microformats
package.description: Display upcoming and recommended events in the sidebar and apply the hCalendar microformat to them.

package.name: serendipity_plugin_multilingual
package.description: Allows visitors to change the frontend interface language

maintainer.name: Garvin Hicking, Wesley Hwang-Chung, Ian Styx

package.name: serendipity_plugin_mycalendar
package.description: Shows your personal calendar with X upcoming scheduled events

maintainer.name: Garvin Hicking, Markus Gerstel, Ian Styx

package.name: serendipity_plugin_spamblock_bee
package.description: Prints out a statistic about your comment spam if your antispam plugins report to the DB.

package.description: This plugin displays a configurable list of the static pages.

maintainer.name: Rob Antonishen, Falk Doering, Ian Styx

maintainer.name: Arnan de Gans, Garvin Hicking, Ian Styx

package.name: serendipity_plugin_userprofiles
package.description: Shows a list for all Authors

package.name: serendipity_plugin_userprofiles_birthdays
package.description: none

package.name: serendipity_plugin_xsstrust
package.description: Displays all users with their ethics (represented by a traffic light). Green light means 'cool'; yellow light means 'warning'; red light means 'banned' The administrator can easily modify this value for each user.

package.name: serendipity_plugin_adduser
package.description: Allows blog visitors to create their own author account. Together with the Event-plugin (index.php?serendipity[subpage]=adduser) you can choose whether only registered users may post comments.

package.name: serendipity_plugin_amazon
package.description: Recommend Products at Amazon within the Amazon-Partnerprogram

maintainer.name: Matthew Groeninger, (original plugin by Thomas Nesges)

package.name: serendipity_plugin_category_dhtml_menu
package.description: DHTML category menu. Requires PEAR::HTML_TreeMenu.

package.name: serendipity_plugin_coppermine
package.description: Display thumbnails from a Coppermine gallery in the sidebar

package.name: serendipity_plugin_creativecommons
package.description: Display a creative commons notification in the sidebar.

package.name: serendipity_plugin_currently
package.description: Displays items you are currently listening, playing, or reading...

package.name: serendipity_plugin_externalphp
package.description: Shows an external PHP application inside your blog with your blogs design and all formattings. USE WITH CARE, THIS PLUGIN HAS SECURITY IMPLICATIONS AS IT INCLUDES ANY GENERIC PHP FILE! YOU CAN ONLY USE THIS PLUGIN AS ADMIN!

package.name: serendipity_plugin_feedburnersidebar
package.description: Adds assorted functionality of the feedburner service into the sidebar.

package.name: serendipity_plugin_flickr
package.description: Display the latest photos from flickr Photostreams.

package.name: serendipity_plugin_flickrbadge
package.description: Shows your last photos on Flickr.com

package.name: serendipity_plugin_ggopis
package.description: Gets and displays a status description of Gadu-Gadu IM

package.name: serendipity_plugin_google_adsense
package.description: Displays adverts from Google.

package.name: serendipity_plugin_google_quicksearch
package.description: (Google)

package.name: serendipity_plugin_heavyrotation
package.description: This plugin displays an album cover from last.fm which was on Heavy Rotation (top album) in the last week

package.name: serendipity_plugin_imagesidebar
package.description: Offers the ability to display images in the sidebar. The source of the images is configurable. The plugin is able to access a Coppermine database directory (MySQL only), or access images in the Serendipity Media Library. PLEASE NOTE: This plugin has been checked working with recent Serendipity installs for the Serendipity Media Library only.

maintainer.name: Andrew Brown (Menalto code), Matthew Groeninger (Unified/Media Lib. Code), Stefan Lange-Hegermann (Zooomr Code), Matthew Maude (Coppermine code), Ian Styx

package.name: serendipity_plugin_karmaranking
package.description: Shows overall score by author

package.name: serendipity_plugin_loginform
package.description: Show a login form for authors

package.name: serendipity_plugin_nugget_multilingual
package.description: Shows an HTML nugget on the sidebar, for a specific language.

package.name: serendipity_plugin_pagerank
package.description: Dynamic display of Google PageRank

package.name: serendipity_plugin_photoblog
package.description: Shows the thumbnails of the most recent photoblog entries (see event plugin).

package.name: serendipity_plugin_piwik
package.description: show statistics of Piwik in sidebar

package.name: serendipity_plugin_pollbox
package.description: Shows the current poll in your sidebar

package.name: serendipity_plugin_popularentries
package.description: Shows the titles and number of comments of the most popular entries calculated according to the entries most commented on.

package.name: serendipity_plugin_quicklink
package.description: Displays a box for quick links

package.name: serendipity_plugin_randomquotes
package.description: Shows a block with a random quotation

package.name: serendipity_plugin_shoutbox
package.description: Displays a shoutbox for unrelated comments

package.name: serendipity_plugin_shoutcast
package.description: Display Shoutcast stream information in the sidebar.

package.name: serendipity_plugin_showentries
package.description: Shows entries of special categories in your sidebar. Good for Sidebar Moblogging!

package.name: serendipity_plugin_sidebarlogo
package.description: Displays a panel containing your logo with a description including all relevant information about your site (an about box).

maintainer.name: Adam Krause & Oliver Gerlach, Ian Styx

package.name: serendipity_plugin_templatedropdown
package.description: Show a box to change themes

package.name: serendipity_plugin_timezones
package.description: Shows the time of up to four timezones
